lead_paragraph: Some of the supplies being sent from this country and Great Britain will be chipped overland from ports on the Caspian Sea to the industrial centers and the fighting front of the Soviets. In the phase of the war that is just beginning, however, the Volga, which already is part of the folklore and folksongs of the Russian people, is destined to play an important part.
abstract: ed on Brit-U S shipments to USSR via Caspian Sea and Volga River
